label: A rdfs:label
definition: AL definition@en SPLIT=|
detection technique: C 'has part' some ( % and 'detection technique') SPLIT=|
evaluant: C ('has specified input' some (% and 'has role' some 'evaluant role')) and (realizes some ('evaluant role' and ('role of' some %))) SPLIT=|
measurand: C ('has specified input' some %) and (realizes some ('measurand role' and ('characteristic of' some %)))
analyte: C ('has specified input' some %) and (realizes some ('analyte role' and ('characteristic of' some %)))
device: C ('has specified input' some %) and (realizes some (function and ('characteristic of' some %))) SPLIT=|
reagent: C ('has specified input' some %) and (realizes some ('reagent role' and ('characteristic of' some %)))
molecular label: C ('has specified input' some %) and (realizes some ('molecular label role' and ('characteristic of' some %)))
target entity: C 'has specified output' some ('is about' some %)
target context: C 'has specified output' some ('is about' some ( 'has assay target context' some %))

label: chemiluminescent assay
definition: An analyte assay that detects a substance by measuring the release of light triggered by a chemical reaction.

label: electrochemiluminescence assay
definition: A chemiluminescent assay that detects a substance by measuring the release of light triggered by an electrochemical reaction.

label: proteomics by mass spectrometry assay
definition: A mass spectrometry assay that identifies and measures proteins.

label: metabolomics mass spectrometry assay
definition: A mass spectrometry assay that identifies and measures metabolites.

label: single cell  assay
definition: A cytometry assay that provides information on a per cell basis.

label: barcoding single cell sequencing assay
definition: A single cell sequencing assay that uses barcoding.

label: single cell sequencing assay
definition: A sequencing assay that provides information on a per cell basis

label: nucleotide barcode
definition: A molecular label composed of short stretches of DNA used to label nucleotides

label: nucleotide barcoding
definition: An addition of molecular label process whereby barcodes are used to label nucleotides

label: cellular indexing of transcriptomes and epitopes by sequencing
definition: single cell RNA sequencing assay that uses nucleotide barcoding to measure the identity and amount of RNA on a per cell basis.

label: immune receptor repertoire sequencing assay
definition: A sequencing assay that determines the sequence of a DNA or RNA molecules that encode the repertoire of B cell receptors or T cell receptors within an input sample.

label: antibody-dependent complement deposition assay
definition: An assay measuring antibody-dependent complement-dependent cytotoxicity.

label: bacterial flagellin detection in plasma assay
definition: An analyte assay measuring bacterial flagellin in a plasma sample.

label: bacterial flagellin detection in feces assay
definition: An analyte assay measuring bacterial flagellin in a feces sample.

label: bacterial lipopolysaccharide detection in plasma assay
definition: An analyte assay measuring bacterial lipopolysaccharide in a plasma sample.

label: bacterial lipopolysaccharide detection in feces assay
definition: An analyte assay measuring bacterial lipopolysaccharide in a feces sample.

label: adenosine deaminase activity assay
definition: An analyte assay measuring adenosine deaminase activity in a sample.

label: pathogen neutralization assay
definition: An assay that measures neutralization of a pathogen.

label: bacterial neutralization assay
definition: A pathogen neutralization assay measuring neutralization of bacteria.

label: viral plaque assay
definition: An analyte assay measuring the number of discrete viral plaques.

label: analyte detection by flow based bead assay
definition: An analyte assay that uses beads to measure the concentration of an analyte with a flow cytometer.
